column4: xb3rt, if you have an old hotmail account, you still can.  Assuming you got grandfathered in.
It shouldn't.  Do you get an error with the message about them being ignored?
no. It's just something I notice when I do it in Yakuake/Terminal and type "sudo apt-get update"
can you pastebin the output you get from that command?
cannot use pastebin. Too many URLs with Terminal reading out the URLs.
want me to email this to you?
they are a little. I notice some of them goto Sources/Translation and others...
no, you shouldn't be worried.  You'll get big error messages (that will be obvious errors) if somethigns wrong
can you help me with another problem?
Feel free to ask (the channel), we have no idea if I can answer it.
how can I get my pc to list all of my hardware (like lspci)?
thanks. I'm probably just going to put my problem on the Forums.
